original: rtogs pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: mi 'gyur rje btsan chos kyi sku //

original: snang dang mi snang gnyis med de //
analyzed: snang dang mi snang gnyis med de

original: smra bsam yul las shin tu 'das //
analyzed: smra bsam yul las shin tu da

analyzed: dmigs med don rtogs chos kyi rje

original: rje btsan don la nyams te dman //
analyzed: rje btsan don la nyams te dman

original: phyi nang gnyis ka bde chen po //
